details.message: PM Bot session started, system audit initiated

details.title: Create pytest fixtures and mock infrastructure
details.reason: Foundation for all test tasks - must be completed first

details.title: Add symbol format validation in trading bot

details.summary: Added _validate_and_filter_symbols() helper method and applied validation at all symbol entry points: _apply_config(), _load_db_config(), _refresh_symbols_from_watchlist(). Validation logs warnings for invalid symbols and filters them out.

Implemented symbol format validation at all entry points. Added _validate_and_filter_symbols() helper that validates lists of symbols, normalizes them to uppercase, and filters out invalid ones with logging.

details.title: Fix useEffect dependency issues in Dashboard.tsx
details.reason: Addressing review feedback - missing ESLint config

details.summary: Created ESLint flat config (v9.x) with react-hooks/exhaustive-deps rule enabled. Includes TypeScript support, react-refresh rules, and unused vars pattern ignoring underscore-prefixed variables.
Addressed review feedback: Created apps/web/eslint.config.js with react-hooks/exhaustive-deps rule. ESLint 9.x flat config format with TypeScript and React Hooks support.

details.title: Add centralized error handling wrapper for botApi.ts

details.summary: Created API types: ApiResponse<T>, ApiError, ApiErrorCode, ApiCallOptions. Defines standardized response format and error codes.
Added wrapApiCall() helper with retry logic, error type helpers (isNetworkError, isAuthError, isRateLimitError, isServerError, isValidationError), and safe* API variants that return ApiResponse<T>.

Implemented centralized error handling: ApiResponse<T> type, wrapApiCall() with automatic retry (1 retry for network/5xx errors), error type detection helpers, and safeBotApi/safePositionsApi/safePerformanceApi/safeSettingsApi wrapped APIs.

details.title: Extract hardcoded values to TradingConfig class

details.summary: Created config module init exporting TradingConfig
Created TradingConfig dataclass with 18 configurable parameters. All values support TRADING_* env var overrides. Includes validation and singleton pattern.

Updated trading_bot.py to use TradingConfig for: cycle_interval_seconds, trailing_stop_pct, trailing_stop_activation_pct, partial_profit_pct, partial_profit_trigger_pct, max_trades_per_day, crypto_max_positions, crypto_entry_threshold, daily_profit_target_pct, max_enabled_symbols, min_buying_power_for_position, limit_order_offset_pct
Extracted 12 magic numbers to TradingConfig class. All values support env var overrides with TRADING_ prefix. No behavior changes - same default values.
